tagline: IBM Watson Text To Speech API
description: The IBMÂ® Text to Speech service provides an API that uses IBM's speech-synthesis capabilities to synthesize text into natural-sounding speech in a variety of languages, accents, and voices.

blocks.name: getVoices
blocks.description: Retrieves a list of all voices available for use with the service. The information includes the voice's name, language, and gender, among other things.

args.name: username
args.info: username obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: password
args.info: password obtained from IBM Bluemix.

blocks.name: getSingleVoice
blocks.description: Lists information about the specified voice.

args.name: username
args.info: username obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: password
args.info: password obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: voice
args.info: The voice about which information is to be returned. Avaliable values: de-DE_BirgitVoice, de-DE_DieterVoice, en-GB_KateVoice, en-US_AllisonVoice, en-US_LisaVoice, en-US_MichaelVoice, es-ES_LauraVoice, es-ES_EnriqueVoice, es-LA_SofiaVoice, es-US_SofiaVoice, fr-FR_ReneeVoice, it-IT_FrancescaVoice, ja-JP_EmiVoice, pt-BR_IsabelaVoice

args.name: customizationId
args.info: The GUID of a custom voice model about which information is to be returned. You must make the request with the service credentials of the model's owner. Omit the parameter to see information about the voice with no customization.

blocks.name: synthesizesTextToAudio
blocks.description: Synthesizes text to spoken audio, returning the synthesized audio stream as an array of bytes.

args.name: username
args.info: username obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: password
args.info: password obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: text
args.info: Provide plain text or text that is annotated with SSML. Text size is limited to 5 KB.

args.name: accept
args.info: The requested MIME type of the audio. Possible values: audio/ogg;codecs=opus (the default), audio/wav, audio/flac, audio/l16;rate=rate, audio/mulaw;rate=rate, audio/basic

args.name: voice
args.info: The voice that is to be used for the synthesis. Avaliable values: de-DE_BirgitVoice, de-DE_DieterVoice, en-GB_KateVoice, en-US_AllisonVoice, en-US_LisaVoice, en-US_MichaelVoice, es-ES_LauraVoice, es-ES_EnriqueVoice, es-LA_SofiaVoice, es-US_SofiaVoice, fr-FR_ReneeVoice, it-IT_FrancescaVoice, ja-JP_EmiVoice, pt-BR_IsabelaVoice

args.name: customizationId
args.info: The GUID of a custom voice model about which information is to be returned. You must make the request with the service credentials of the model's owner. Omit the parameter to see information about the voice with no customization.

blocks.name: getPronunciation
blocks.description: Returns the phonetic pronunciation for the specified word.

args.name: username
args.info: username obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: password
args.info: password obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: text
args.info: Provide plain text or text that is annotated with SSML. Text size is limited to 5 KB.

args.name: voice
args.info: The voice in which the pronunciation for the specified word is to be returned. Avaliable values: de-DE_BirgitVoice, de-DE_DieterVoice, en-GB_KateVoice, en-US_AllisonVoice, en-US_LisaVoice, en-US_MichaelVoice, es-ES_LauraVoice, es-ES_EnriqueVoice, es-LA_SofiaVoice, es-US_SofiaVoice, fr-FR_ReneeVoice, it-IT_FrancescaVoice, ja-JP_EmiVoice, pt-BR_IsabelaVoice

args.name: format
args.info: The phoneme set in which the pronunciation is to be returned: ipa (the default), ibm

args.name: customizationId
args.info: The GUID of a custom voice model about which information is to be returned. You must make the request with the service credentials of the model's owner. Omit the parameter to see information about the voice with no customization.

blocks.name: createVoiceModel
blocks.description: Creates a new empty custom voice model that is owned by the requesting user.

args.name: username
args.info: username obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: password
args.info: password obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: name
args.info: The name of the new custom voice model.

args.name: language
args.info: The language of the new custom voice model. Avaliable values: de-DE, en-GB, en-US (the default), es-ES, es-LA, es-US, fr-FR, it-IT, ja-JP, pt-BR

args.name: description
args.info: A description of the new custom voice model.

blocks.name: getSingleVoiceModel
blocks.description: Lists all information about the specified custom voice model.

args.name: username
args.info: username obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: password
args.info: password obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: customizationId
args.info: The GUID of the custom voice model that is to be returned. You must make the request with the service credentials of the model's owner.

blocks.name: updateVoiceModel
blocks.description: Updates information for the specified custom voice model.

args.name: username
args.info: username obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: password
args.info: password obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: customizationId
args.info: The GUID of the custom voice model to be updated. You must make the request with the service credentials of the model's owner.

args.name: name
args.info: A new name for the custom voice model.

args.name: description
args.info: A description of the new custom voice model.

args.name: words
args.info: Array of objects. An array of WordUpdate objects that provides a list of words and their translations to be added to or updated in the custom voice model. Send an empty array to make no additions or updates. See README for more details.

blocks.name: getVoiceModels
blocks.description: Lists metadata such as the name and description for all custom voice models that you own for all languages. Specify a language to list the voice models that you own for the specified language only.

args.name: username
args.info: username obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: password
args.info: password obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: language
args.info: The language for which custom voice models owned by the requester are to be returned. Possible values: de-DE, en-GB, en-US, es-ES, es-LA, es-US, fr-FR, it-IT, ja-JP, pt-BR

blocks.name: addWordsToVoiceModel
blocks.description: Adds one or more words and their translations to the specified custom voice model. Adding a new translation for a word that already exists in a custom model overwrites the word's existing translation.

args.name: username
args.info: username obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: password
args.info: password obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: customizationId
args.info: The GUID of the custom voice model that is to be updated. You must make the request with the service credentials of the model's owner.

args.name: words
args.info: Array of objects. An array of WordAdd objects that provides information about the words to be added to the custom voice model. See README for more details.

blocks.name: addSingleWordToVoiceModel
blocks.description: Adds a single word and its translation to the specified custom voice model. Adding a new translation for a word that already exists in a custom model overwrites the word's existing translation.

args.name: username
args.info: username obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: password
args.info: password obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: customizationId
args.info: The GUID of the custom voice model that is to be updated. You must make the request with the service credentials of the model's owner.

args.name: word
args.info: The word that is to be added to the custom voice model.

args.name: translation
args.info: The phonetic or sounds-like translation for the word. A phonetic translation is based on the SSML format for representing the phonetic string of a word either as an IPA or IBM SPR translation. A sounds-like translation consists of one or more words that, when combined, sound like the word.

blocks.name: getVoiceModelWords
blocks.description: Lists all of the words and their translations for the specified custom voice model.

args.name: username
args.info: username obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: password
args.info: password obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: customizationId
args.info: The GUID of the custom voice model that is to be updated. You must make the request with the service credentials of the model's owner.

blocks.name: getVoiceModelSingleWord
blocks.description: Returns the translation for a single word from the specified custom model.

args.name: username
args.info: username obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: password
args.info: password obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: customizationId
args.info: The GUID of the custom voice model that is to be updated. You must make the request with the service credentials of the model's owner.

args.name: word
args.info: The word that is to be returned from the custom voice model.

blocks.name: deleteVoiceModelSingleWord
blocks.description: Deletes a single word from the specified custom voice model. Only the owner of a custom voice model can use this method to delete a word from the model.

args.name: username
args.info: username obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: password
args.info: password obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: customizationId
args.info: The GUID of the custom voice model from which the word is to be deleted. You must make the request with the service credentials of the model's owner.

args.name: word
args.info: The word that is to be deleted from the custom voice model.

blocks.name: deleteVoiceModel
blocks.description: Deletes the custom voice model with the specified customization_id. Only the owner of a custom voice model can use this method to delete the model.

args.name: username
args.info: username obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: password
args.info: password obtained from IBM Bluemix.

args.name: customizationId
args.info: The GUID of the custom voice model that is to be deleted. You must make the request with the service credentials of the model's owner.
